subject: Research
NCAA Basketball Tournament (Men)
College Athletics
Basketball
lead_paragraph: An analysis of over 6,000 N.C.A.A. basketball games played in the past four seasons shows that trailing by a little can actually be a good thing.
snippet: An analysis of over 6,000 N.C.A.A. basketball games played in the past four seasons shows that trailing by a little can actually be a good thing.
